title: MCP Server Status Summary 2025-09-25
description: Comprehensive MCP server testing results: WORKING (8/13): Filesystem, Supabase, GitHub, Context7, Magic UI, Metricool, Notion (fixed), Wix. FAILED (5/13): Brave Search (SUBSCRIPTION_TOKEN_INVALID), Xero (OAuth required), N8N (connection failed), Slack (connection failed), Task Master (connection failed). Success rate 62%. Token replacement solution from environment variables was highly effective for authentication issues.
